ä»¥æ­¤ä½œä¸ºæµ‹è¯•é›† (test) å°†æ¯ä¸ªæå–çš„åæ ‡ç‚¹çš„ä½ç½®å‰å dx dz ä¸ªç‚¹ç»„æˆä¸€ä¸ªè®­ç»ƒæ•°æ® slice ï¼Œæ’å€¼åå¾—åˆ° train_slice_new ,32 x 32 å¼€å§‹å°†æ¯ä¸ªç‚¹æ„æˆçš„ slice æ‰”å…¥ç½‘ç»œä¸­è®­ç»ƒã€‚ å‘è®­ç»ƒå¥½çš„ç½‘ç»œæ‰”æ•°æ®æ—¶ï¼Œç”±äºå¾…åˆ†ç±»çš„æ•°æ®é›†ï¼ˆtestï¼‰è¿‡å¤§ï¼Œå¾ˆå®¹æ˜“å¯¼è‡´å†…å­˜çˆ†ç‚¸ï¼Œå› æ­¤ä¸€èˆ¬å°† test æ•°æ®åˆ†æˆ100 ä»½ï¼Œä¸€ä»½ä¸€ä»½è¾“å…¥ã€‚ åœ¨è¾“å‡ºçš„å¯¹åº” label çš„æ¦‚ç‡ï¼Œé€‰æ‹©æ¦‚ç‡å¤§çš„é‚£ä¸€ä¸ªä½œä¸ºé¢„æµ‹æ ‡ç­¾ï¼Œå°†è¾“å‡ºç»“æœé‡æ–°æ‹¼æ¥ ä¸‰ã€matlabä»£ç clear all,close all addpath ./CNN addpath ./util addpath ./data/ %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% % Inputs % %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% ntrain=100; % The number of training set ntrain1=100; % wdx=8; wdz=8; image_x=wdx*2+1; % Original Image Patch Size X image_z=wdz*2+1; % Original Image Patch Size Z % Intepolate image to make sure size before pooling is even image_x_new=32; % Intepolated Image Patch Size X image_z_new=32; % Intepolated Image Patch Size Z opts.alpha = 1; % Learning Rate opts.batchsize = 2; % Minibatch Size opts.numepochs = 30; % Iteration Number %%%% CNN structure %%%%%%% cnn.layers = { struct('type', 'i') %input layer struct('type', 'c', 'outputmaps', 6, 'kernelsize', 5) %convolution layer struct('type', 's', 'scale', 2) %sub sampling layer struct('type', 'c', 'outputmaps', 12, 'kernelsize', 5) %convolution layer struct('type', 's', 'scale', 2) %sub sampling layer }; %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% % Step 1 Prepare test and training set % %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% load real.mat image_input=data; figure(2) imagesc(image_input); colorbar colormap(jet) a = questdlg('æ˜¯å¦å¯¼å…¥å·²æœ‰åæ ‡ï¼Ÿ','é—®é¢˜æç¤º','Yes','No','Yes'); % %%%%%%%%%%% Load Prepared training set%%%%%%%%%%%%% % Pick Train Examples % Pick Crack points if a == "Yes" %Crack Points [file_name,path_name] = uigetfile({'*.mat';'*.dat';'*.txt'},'Crack Points'); file_path = [path_name file_name] ; data = cell2mat(struct2cell(load(file_path))) ; [ntrain,col]= size(data); train.label(1:ntrain)=1; train.label(2,1:ntrain)=0; train.trainx(1:ntrain) = data(:,1)'; train.trainz(1:ntrain) = data(:,2)'; hold on scatter(data(:,1),data(:,2),18,'or','filled') clear data %Non-Crack Points [file_name,path_name] = uigetfile({'*.mat';'*.dat';'*.txt'},'Non-Crack Points'); file_path = [path_name file_name] ; data = cell2mat(struct2cell(load(file_path))) ; % [ntrain,col]= size(data); train.label(ntrain+1:2*ntrain)=0; train.label(2,ntrain+1:2*ntrain)=1; train.trainx(ntrain+1:2*ntrain) = data(:,1)'; train.trainz(ntrain+1:2*ntrain) = data(:,2)'; hold on scatter(data(:,1),data(:,2),18,'ok','filled') % clear data else title('Pick Crack Points','fontsize',22); train.label(1:ntrain)=1; train.label(2,1:ntrain)=0; for i = 1:ntrain [train.trainx(i),train.trainz(i)]=ginput(1); hold on scatter(train.trainx(i),train.trainz(i),18,'or','filled') title(['Pick Crack Points',num2str(i),'/',num2str(ntrain)],'fontsize',22); end %save label 0 ax1=[train.trainx(1:ntrain)', train.trainz(1:ntrain)']; [filename,pathname] = uiputfile({'*.mat'}, 'ä¿å­˜åæ ‡'); str=[pathname filename]; save(str,'ax1') aa = msgbox('æ–‡ä»¶å·²ä¿å­˜','OK','help'); pause(1) delete(aa) %save label 1 % pause(1) % figure(2) hold on % imagesc(image_input); % caxis ([0 0.8]) % colormap(jet) % Pick No-crack points title('Pick Non-Crack Points','fontsize',22); train.label(ntrain+1:2*ntrain)=0; train.label(2,ntrain+1:2*ntrain)=1; hold on for i = ntrain+1:2*ntrain [train.trainx(i),train.trainz(i)]=ginput(1); hold on scatter(train.trainx(i),train.trainz(i),18,'ok','filled') title(['Pick Non-Crack Points',num2str(i-ntrain),'/',num2str(ntrain)],'fontsize',22); end % [train.trainx(ntrain+1:2*ntrain),train.trainz(ntrain+1:2*ntrain)]=ginput(ntrain); ax2=[train.trainx(ntrain+1:2*ntrain)',train.trainz(ntrain+1:2*ntrain)']; [filename,pathname] = uiputfile({'*.mat'}, 'ä¿å­˜åæ ‡'); str=[pathname filename]; save(str,'ax2') aa = msgbox('æ–‡ä»¶å·²ä¿å­˜','OK','help'); pause(1) delete(aa) end pause(1) %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% % Step 2 Convert Image into Image patches % %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% [nz,nx]=size(image_input); image_pad=padimage(image_input,wdz,wdx); %%% Obtain image batches from full image image_slice=zeros(image_z,image_x,nz*nx); image_slice_new=zeros(image_z_new,image_x_new,nz*nx); [Xq,Zq]=meshgrid(1:(image_x-1)/(image_x_new-1):image_x,1:(image_z-1)/(image_z_new-1):image_z); ii=1; for ix=1:nx for iz=1:nz image_slice(1:image_z,1:image_x,ii)=image_pad(iz:iz+image_z-1,ix:ix+image_x-1); image_slice_new(:,:,ii)=interp2(image_slice(:,:,ii),Xq,Zq); ii=ii+1; end end %%% Obtain image batches from train set train_slice=zeros(image_z,image_x,2*ntrain); train_slice_new=zeros(image_z_new,image_x_new,2*ntrain); [Xq,Zq]=meshgrid(1:(image_x-1)/(image_x_new-1):image_x,1:(image_z-1)/(image_z_new-1):image_z); for in=1:2*ntrain train_slice(1:image_z,1:image_x,in)=... image_pad(train.trainz(in):train.trainz(in)+image_z-1,train.trainx(in):train.trainx(in)+image_x-1); train_slice_new(:,:,in)=interp2(train_slice(:,:,in),Xq,Zq); end clear image_slice train_slice %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% % Step 3 Train CNN structure % %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% %%%% Input Training and Test set train_x =train_slice_new; % Training set train_y =train.label; % Training label test_x =image_slice_new; % Test set rand('state',0) cnn = cnnsetup(cnn, train_x, train_y); cnn = cnntrain(cnn, train_x, train_y, opts); %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% % Step 4 Input full image for Classification % % (Seperate The Image into 100 parts In case of out of memory) % %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% %% [a,b,c] = size(image_input) k1 = round(b/10) -1 for ii = 1:k1 disp(['part ',num2str(ii)]) uu = cnnff(cnn,test_x(:,:,a*10*(ii-1)+1 :a*10*ii)); [vv,ll]=max(uu.o); ui=reshape(-ll+2,a,10); un(:,10*(ii-1)+1:10*ii)=ui(:,1:10); end disp(['final part']) uu = cnnff(cnn,test_x(:,:,a*10*k1+1:b*a)); [vv,ll2]=max(uu.o); ui2=reshape(-ll2+2,a,b-k1*10); un(:,10*k1+1:b)=ui2(:,1:b-k1*10); %% %%%%%%%% Image the result %%%%%%%%%%%% figure(1) subplot(1,2,1) imagesc(image_input) hold on scatter( train.trainx(ntrain+1:2*ntrain), train.trainz(ntrain+1:2*ntrain),18,'ok','filled') hold on scatter( train.trainx(1:ntrain), train.trainz(1:ntrain),18,'or','filled') title({['Input Image']},'fontsize',22,'color','black') set(gca,'fontsize',22) xlabel('Pixels','fontsize',22) ylabel('Pixels','fontsize',22) subplot(1,2,2) imagesc(un) title({['CNN Labels']},'fontsize',22,'color','black') set(gca,'fontsize',22) xlabel('Pixels','fontsize',22) ylabel('Pixels','fontsize',22) set(gcf,'unit','centimeters','position',[12 5 30 13]) colormap(parula) %%%%%%%%%Plot the error curve %%%%%%%%%%% figure(2) plot(cnn.rL); title({['Misfit Curve']},'fontsize',22,'color','black') set(gca,'fontsize',22) xlabel('Iteration','fontsize',22) ylabel('Misfit','fontsize',22) % % æ·»åŠ ç‚¹æ•°ä»£ç ï¼š clear all,close all ntrain=20; % The number of training set % å¢åŠ æ ‡è®°çš„ç‚¹ï¼Œå¢åŠ ç‚¹æ•°æ—¶æ—¶æ˜¾ç¤º load real(1).mat image_input=data; figure(1) imagesc(image_input); colorbar a = questdlg('æ˜¯å¦å¯¼å…¥å·²æœ‰åæ ‡ï¼Ÿ','é—®é¢˜æç¤º','Yes','No','Yes'); if a == "Yes" %Crack Points [file_name,path_name] = uigetfile({'*.mat';'*.dat';'*.txt'},'Crack Points'); file_path = [path_name file_name] ; data = cell2mat(struct2cell(load(file_path))) ; hold on scatter(data(:,1),data(:,2),18,'or','filled') %Non-Crack Points [file_name,path_name] = uigetfile({'*.mat';'*.dat';'*.txt'},'Non-Crack Points'); file_path = [path_name file_name] ; data2 = cell2mat(struct2cell(load(file_path))) ; hold on scatter(data2(:,1),data2(:,2),18,'ok','filled') %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% % repick points %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% title('Pick new Crack Points','fontsize',22); hold on for i = ntrain+1:2*ntrain [train.trainx(i),train.trainz(i)]=ginput(1); hold on scatter(train.trainx(i),train.trainz(i),18,'or','filled') title(['Pick Non-Crack Points',num2str(i-ntrain),'/',num2str(ntrain)],'fontsize',22); end ax2=[data;train.trainx(ntrain+1:2*ntrain)',train.trainz(ntrain+1:2*ntrain)']; [filename,pathname] = uiputfile({'*.mat'}, 'ä¿å­˜åæ ‡'); str=[pathname filename]; save(str,'ax2') aa = msgbox('æ–‡ä»¶å·²ä¿å­˜','OK','help'); pause(1) delete(aa) end title('Pick new NON Crack Points','fontsize',22); train.label(ntrain+1:2*ntrain)=0; train.label(2,ntrain+1:2*ntrain)=1; hold on for i = ntrain+1:2*ntrain [train.trainx(i),train.trainz(i)]=ginput(1); hold on scatter(train.trainx(i),train.trainz(i),18,'ko','filled') title(['Pick Non-Crack Points',num2str(i-ntrain),'/',num2str(ntrain)],'fontsize',22); end % [train.trainx(ntrain+1:2*ntrain),train.trainz(ntrain+1:2*ntrain)]=ginput(ntrain); ax22=[data2;train.trainx(ntrain+1:2*ntrain)',train.trainz(ntrain+1:2*ntrain)']; [filename,pathname] = uiputfile({'*.mat'}, 'ä¿å­˜åæ ‡'); str=[pathname filename]; save(str,'ax22') aa = Pæ˜¯çŠ¶æ€è½¬ç§»æ¦‚ç‡ï¼ˆtransition probabilityï¼‰å‡½æ•° $$P(sâ€™|s,a)=P(s_{t+1}=sâ€™|s_t=s,a_t=a)$$ r æ˜¯å¥–åŠ±å‡½æ•°ï¼ˆreward functionï¼‰ï¼š$$ r(s,a)=E(r_{t+1}|s_t=s,a_t=a)$$ Î³æ˜¯è¡°å‡ç³»æ•°ï¼ˆdiscount factorï¼‰ï¼šÎ³âˆˆ[0,1] ç­–ç•¥ï¼šÎ  ä»·å€¼å‡½æ•°ï¼ˆvalue functionï¼‰/çŠ¶æ€ä»·å€¼å‡½æ•°ï¼ˆstate value functionï¼‰ï¼š åŠ¨ä½œä»·å€¼å‡½æ•°ï¼ˆaction value functionï¼‰: 3.æ­£åˆ™åŒ–$$\min_{f\in \mathcal F} \frac{1}{N}\sum _{i=1} ^NL(y_i,f(x_i))+\lambda J(f)$$ å…¶ä¸­ï¼Œç¬¬1é¡¹æ˜¯ç»éªŒé£é™©ï¼Œç¬¬2é¡¹æ˜¯æ­£åˆ™åŒ–é¡¹ï¼Œ$$\lambda \ge0$$ä¸ºè°ƒæ•´ä¸¤è€…ä¹‹é—´å…³ç³»çš„ç³»æ•°ã€‚ åœ¨å›å½’é—®é¢˜ä¸­ï¼ŒæŸå¤±å‡½æ•°æ˜¯å¹³æ–¹æŸå¤±ï¼Œæ­£åˆ™åŒ–é¡¹å¯ä»¥æ˜¯å‚æ•°å‘é‡çš„$$L_2$$èŒƒæ•°ï¼š$$L(w)=\frac{1}{N}\sum _{i=1} ^N(f(x_i;w)-y_i)^2 \frac{\lambda}{2}||w||^2$$è¿™é‡Œï¼Œ$||w||^2$è¡¨ç¤ºå‘é‡ $w$çš„$L_2$èŒƒæ•°ã€‚ ä»è´å¶æ–¯ä¼°è®¡çš„è§’åº¦æ¥çœ‹ï¼Œæ­£åˆ™åŒ–é¡¹å¯¹åº”ç€æ¨¡å‹çš„å…ˆéªŒæ¦‚ç‡ã€‚ 4.æ³›åŒ–è¯¯å·®ä¸Šç•Œ å®šç† å¯¹äºŒåˆ†ç±»é—®é¢˜ï¼Œå½“å‡è®¾ç©ºé—´æ˜¯æœ‰é™ä¸ªå‡½æ•°çš„é›†åˆ$$\mathcal F ={f_1,f_2,\cdot \cdot \cdot ,f_d}$$æ—¶ï¼Œå¯¹ä»»æ„ä¸€ä¸ªå‡½æ•°$$f\in \mathcal F$$ ,è‡³å°‘ä»¥æ¦‚ç‡1-Î´ï¼Œ0<Î´<1ï¼Œä¸€ä¸‹ä¸ç­‰å¼æˆç«‹ï¼š$$R(f) \le \hat R(f) + \varepsilon(d,N,\delta)$$å…¶ä¸­ï¼Œ$$\varepsilon = \sqrt{\frac{1}{2N}(log\,d+log\,\frac{1}{\delta})}$$ æ¨åˆ°è¿‡ç¨‹ï¼ˆå…³é”®æ­¥éª¤ï¼‰ï¼š$$\begin{aligned}P(\exist f \in \mathcal F :R(f) - \hat R(f))&=P(\bigcup_{f \in \mathcal F} { R(f) - \hat R(f) \ge \varepsilon })\qquad#å„ä¸ªæ¨¡å‹å‘ç”Ÿæ¦‚ç‡çš„å’Œäº‹ä»¶ï¼Œå–å¹¶é›†\&\le \sum _{f \in \mathcal F}P(R(f) - \hat R(f)\ge \varepsilon)\qquad \quad#åŠ æ³•å…¬å¼P(A\bigcup B) \le P(A)+P(B)\&\le d\,exp(-2N\varepsilon^2)\qquad\qquad \qquad\quad#Hoeffdingä¸ç­‰å¼ \end{aligned}$$ 5.ç›‘ç£å­¦ä¹ åº”ç”¨$$\begin{cases}åˆ†ç±»é—®é¢˜\begin{cases}åˆ†ç±»å™¨ï¼ˆå­¦ä¹ ç³»ç»Ÿã€åˆ†ç±»ç³»ç»Ÿï¼‰ \è¯„ä»·æŒ‡æ ‡\begin{cases}åˆ†ç±»å‡†ç¡®ç‡\ç²¾ç¡®ç‡ï¼šé¢„æµ‹æ­£ç¡®çš„æ­£ç±»æ•°/é¢„æµ‹çš„æ€»æ­£ç±»æ•°\å¬å›ç‡ï¼šé¢„æµ‹æ­£ç¡®çš„æ­£ç±»æ•°/çœŸæ­£ç±»æ€»æ•°\F_1å€¼ï¼šç²¾ç¡®ç‡å’Œå¬å›ç‡çš„è°ƒå’Œå¹³å‡å€¼ \end{cases}\end{cases}\æ ‡æ³¨é—®é¢˜\begin{cases}ç»“æ„é¢„æµ‹é—®é¢˜çš„ç®€å•å½¢å¼\å¸¸ç”¨æ–¹æ³•ï¼šéšé©¬å°”å¯å¤«æ¨¡å‹ã€æ¡ä»¶éšæœºåœº \end{cases}\å›å½’é—®é¢˜\end{cases}$$ ç¬¬äºŒç«  æ„ŸçŸ¥æœº æ„ŸçŸ¥æœºå¯¹åº”äºè¾“å…¥ç©ºé—´ï¼ˆç‰¹å¾ç©ºé—´ï¼‰ä¸­å°†å®ä¾‹åˆ’åˆ†ä¸ºæ­£è´Ÿä¸¤ç±»çš„åˆ†ç¦»è¶…å¹³é¢ï¼Œå±äºåˆ¤åˆ«æ¨¡å‹ã€‚$$f(x) = sign(w\, \cdot \, x+b )\å…¶ä¸­ï¼Œ\mathcal X \sube \mathbf R^n, x\in \mathcal X,\mathcal Y ={ +1,-1 };\y\in \mathcal Y\;è¡¨ç¤ºå®ä¾‹çš„ç±»åˆ«$$ $$sign(x)=\begin{cases}+1,\quad x\ge0 \-1,\quad x \le 0 \end {cases}$$ æ„ŸçŸ¥æœºçš„å‡è®¾ç©ºé—´æ˜¯å®šä¹‰åœ¨ç‰¹å¾ç©ºé—´ä¸­çš„æ‰€æœ‰çº¿æ€§åˆ†ç±»æ¨¡å‹æˆ–çº¿æ€§åˆ†ç±»å™¨ï¼Œå³å‡½æ•°é›†åˆ $${f|f(x)=w\cdot x+b}$$ ã€‚ å‡ ä½•è§£é‡Šï¼š çº¿æ€§æ–¹ç¨‹ $$w \cdot x +b=0$$ ï¼Œå¯¹åº”äºç‰¹å¾ç©ºé—´ $$\mathbf R^n $$ ä¸­çš„ä¸€ä¸ªè¶…å¹³é¢Sï¼Œå…¶ä¸­ w æ˜¯è¶…å¹³é¢çš„æ³•å‘é‡ï¼Œb æ˜¯è¶…å¹³é¢çš„æˆªè·ã€‚è¿™ä¸ªè¶…å¹³é¢å°†ç‰¹å¾ç©ºé—´åˆ’åˆ†ä¸ºä¸¤éƒ¨åˆ†ã€‚è¶…å¹³é¢Sç§°ä¸ºåˆ†ç¦»è¶…å¹³é¢ï¼ˆseparating hyperplane ï¼‰

posts.title: åœ°éœ‡ä½œä¸š
posts.text:
[toc] ä¸€ã€è®¾ç½®æ¨¡å‹ç½‘æ ¼å¤§å°è®¾ç½®ä¸º $$ 200	imes300 $$ ,å‡åŒ€åˆ’åˆ†ä¸‰å±‚ï¼Œå±‚é€Ÿåº¦ä¸º2500 m/s , 4000 m/s , 5000 m/s CMPé“é›†ï¼š ï¼ˆ Common Middle Point ï¼‰å…±ä¸­å¿ƒç‚¹é“é›† é€Ÿåº¦åˆ†æåŸç†ï¼š â€‹ ç”±äº$$t_0$$æœªçŸ¥ï¼Œå‡æ–¹æ ¹é€Ÿåº¦v æœªçŸ¥ï¼Œå› æ­¤é‡‡ç”¨ç©·ä¸¾æ³•ï¼Œéå†æ¯ä¸€ä¸ª$$t_0$$æ—¶åˆ»å¯¹åº”çš„æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªå¯èƒ½çš„å‡æ–¹æ ¹é€Ÿåº¦ v â€‹ æ ¹æ®å‡è®¾çš„$$t_0$$å’Œ v ï¼Œå°†æ‰€æœ‰CMPé“çš„åœ°éœ‡è®°å½•æŒ¯å¹…æ±‚å–å¹³å‡å€¼ï¼Œå½“$$t_0$$ä¸å‡æ–¹æ ¹é€Ÿåº¦v éƒ½å’Œå®é™…åœ°å±‚å»åˆæ—¶ï¼ŒæŒ¯å¹…è¾¾åˆ°æœ€å¤§ã€‚ â€‹ ç»˜åˆ¶æŒ¯å¹…çš„ v - $$t_0$$ ç­‰å€¼çº¿å›¾ï¼Œç­‰å€¼çº¿æœ€ä¸ºå¯†é›†å¤„å³ä¸ºæŒ¯å¹…æœ€å¤§å€¼ç‚¹ï¼Œå³æ‰€æ±‚çš„å‚æ•°ï¼Œå†ä¾æ®è¿ªå…‹æ–¯å…¬å¼ï¼Œå³å¯åæ¼”å‡ºç›¸åº”çš„å±‚é€Ÿåº¦ï¼Œè¿›è€Œå¯æ±‚å‡ºåœ°å±‚åšåº¦ import numpy as np # import numpy.matlib import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import math ####### # Three layers model # set parameters X = 100; Y = 30 v1 = 2500; v2 = 4000; v3 = 5000 dx = 20; dz = 20; dt = 0.001 rou = [1.0]*3 t1 = 2*dz*Y/3/v1 ; t2 = 2*dz*Y/3/v2 t0 = np.array([t1, t1 + t2]) v = np.array([v1, np.sqrt((np.power(v1, 2)*t1+np.power(v2, 2)*t2)/(t1+t2))]) print('True velocity :
','v1 = ',v1,' m / s
v2 = ',v2,' m / s') # calculate times temp1 = []; temp2 = [] x = np.linspace(dx,X*dx,X) for xx in x: # record times # temp = [[2*np.sqrt(np.power(xx*dx,2)/np.power(v[0],2)+np.power(t0[0],2))],[2*np.sqrt(np.power(xx*dx,2)/np.power(v[1],2)+np.power(t0[1],2))]] temp1.append(round(np.sqrt(np.power(xx,2)/np.power(v[0],2)+np.power(t0[0],2)),3)) temp2.append(round(np.sqrt(np.power(xx,2)/np.power(v[1],2)+np.power(t0[1],2)),3)) T = np.array([temp1, temp2]).T max_t = max([max(temp1),max(temp2)]) +0.2 # print('The total time is :',max_t,' s') # print(T.shape) # calculate parameters Z1 = rou[0]*v1; Z2 = rou[1]*v2; Z3 = rou[2]*v3 R = (Z2 - Z1)/(Z2 + Z1) Tou = 4*rou[0]*rou[1]*v1*v2*(Z3-Z2)/(np.power(Z1+Z2,2)*(Z3+Z2)) # plot cmp Z = np.linspace(0, max_t, max_t*(1/dt) + 1) # æ­¤æ—¶ï¼ŒZ[1]å³ä¸º0.001 cmp_1 = np.zeros((int(max_t*(1/dt))+1,X)) for xx in range(X): cmp_1[int(T[xx,0]*int(1/dt))][xx] = R*35 cmp_1[int(T[xx,1]*int(1/dt))][xx] = Tou*35 plt.plot(cmp_1[:,xx]+dx*(xx+1),Z,'k') ax = plt.gca() ax.invert_yaxis() ax.spines['bottom'].set_color('none'); ax.spines['right'].set_color('none') ax.xaxis.set_ticks_position('top') ax.set_title('offset-t cmp') ax.tick_params(direction='in') plt.show() # ricker subwave def ricker(t,fm): a = 1-2*np.square(math.pi*fm*t)*np.exp(-np.square(math.pi*fm*t)) return a # convolve x_ = np.linspace(-0.01, 0.01, 21) y_ = ricker(x_,30)*100 # lenth = int(max_t*(1/dt))+21 cmp_1 = cmp_1/35 # cmp_2 = np.zeros((lenth,X)) cmp_2 = cmp_1 for xx in range(X) : # cmp_2[:, xx] = np.convolve(cmp_1[:,xx], y_, mode='full') cmp_2[:, xx] = np.convolve(cmp_1[:,xx], y_, mode='same') # plt.plot(cmp_2[:,xx]+dx*(xx+1),range(lenth),'k') plt.plot(cmp_2[:,xx]+dx*(xx+1),Z,'k') ax1 = plt.gca() ax1.invert_yaxis() ax1.spines['bottom'].set_color('none'); ax1.spines['right'].set_color('none') ax1.xaxis.set_ticks_position('top') ax1.set_title('cmp convolve ricker') ax1.tick_params(direction='in') plt.show() # add noise for xx in range(X) : cmp_2[:, xx] = cmp_2[:, xx] + np.random.randn(int(max_t*(1/dt)) + 1) plt.plot(cmp_2[:,xx]+dx*(xx+1),Z,'k') ax2 = plt.gca() ax2.invert_yaxis() ax2.spines['bottom'].set_color('none'); ax1.spines['right'].set_color('none') ax2.xaxis.set_ticks_position('top') ax2.set_title('cmp add noise') ax2.tick_params(direction='in') plt.show() plt.show() # velocity spectrum M = 40 start_1 = round(T[X-1, 0] - M*dt, 3); end_1 = T[X-1, 0] + M*dt start_2 = round(T[X-1, 1] - M*dt, 3); end_2 = T[X-1, 1] + M*dt # t_min ~ t_max tn_1 = np.linspace(start_1,end_1,2*M+1) - t0[0] tn_2 = np.linspace(start_2,end_2,2*M+1) - t0[1] # print('dfsadgadsg',start_1,end_1,start_1-end_1,start_1+end_1) v_s1 = dx*X/np.sqrt(2*t0[0]*tn_1 + np.square(tn_1)) v_s2 = dx*X/np.sqrt(2*t0[1]*tn_2 + np.square(tn_2)) # print(tn_1) # print(end_1,start_1,int((end_1-start_1)/dt)) # è¿™æ ·è®¡ç®—æ—¶ï¼Œç”±äºå°æ•°æµ®ç‚¹å‹åè¿›åˆ¶è½¬äºŒè¿›åˆ¶èˆå…¥è¯¯å·®é€ æˆ0.16-0.015ï¼= 0.145ï¼Œè®¡ç®—ç»“æœä¸º0.145000000000002 A_1 = np.zeros((2*M+1, 1)) A_2 = np.zeros((2*M+1, 1)) for zz in range(2*M + 1): for xx in range(X): A_1[zz] = A_1[zz] + cmp_2[int(T[xx, 0]/dt) - M + zz, xx] A_2[zz] = A_2[zz] + cmp_2[int(T[xx, 1]/dt) - M + zz, xx] A_1[zz] = A_1[zz]/X A_2[zz] = A_2[zz]/X # a=float(max(A_2)) # b=float(min(A_2)) # print(max(A_2),min(A_2),round(a,1),round(b,1)) # print(A_2) plt.plot(np.array(v_s1),np.array(A_1) + t0[1]/dt -60,'k') plt.plot(np.array(v_s2),np.array(A_2) + t0[0]/dt,'k') ax4 = plt.gca() # ax4.invert_yaxis() ax4.spines['bottom'].set_color('none'); %æ ¹æ®posè®¡ç®—lieä¸‹æ ‡ row=round(pos(2)):round(pos(2)+pos(4)); %æ ¹æ®posè®¡ç®—hangä¸‹æ ‡ %ç”±äºposè¿”å›æœ‰å°æ•°ï¼Œç”¨roundå–æ•´ b=a(row,col); %æ ¹æ®rowï¼Œcolï¼Œä»aä¸­æå–çŸ©é˜µb figure imagesc(b) ä½¿ç”¨é¼ æ ‡ç‚¹å‡»æå–ç‚¹åæ ‡ function Untitled_7_Callback(hObject, eventdata, handles) % é€‰æ‹©çª—å£ figure global data imagesc(data(:,:,1)) x1=[];y1=[]; ed1=ed-k+1; if st1>0; cg(st1,j)=cg(st1,j)*k/tap_size; end %åœ¨çª—å£å¤–å›´è‡³tapåŒºåŸŸï¼Œé€æ¸å‰Šå¼±è®°å½•å€¼ if ed1<nt; cg(ed1,j)=cg(ed1,j)*k/tap_size; end end end end data(:,:,is)=cg; end 2.å…³é—­æŒ‡å®š figurefigrue(i) %æ‰“å¼€ç¬¬iä¸ªå›¾ plot... ç”»å›¾ colse(figure(i)) % å…³é—­ç¬¬i ä¸ªå›¾ 3.å·ç§¯äº’ç›¸å…³å…¶ä¸­ï¼Œåªèƒ½å¤„ç†è¿ç»­æ”¾ç‚®ï¼Œä¸èƒ½å¤„ç†é—´éš”å‡ ä¸ªæ£€æ³¢å™¨æ”¾ç‚®çš„æƒ…å†µã€‚ ä»£ç ï¼š æˆæœå›¾æ˜¾ç¤ºï¼š for i=1:ns g=data(:,:,i); [TOC] 1. superå‡½æ•°ä¸å­ç±»ç»§æ‰¿çˆ¶ç±»æ„é€ å‡½æ•°æƒ…å†µä¸€ï¼šå­ç±»éœ€è¦è‡ªåŠ¨è°ƒç”¨çˆ¶ç±»çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼šå­ç±»ä¸é‡å†™init()æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå®ä¾‹åŒ–å­ç±»åï¼Œä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨è°ƒç”¨çˆ¶ç±»çš„init()çš„æ–¹æ³•ã€‚ æƒ…å†µäºŒï¼šå­ç±»ä¸éœ€è¦è‡ªåŠ¨è°ƒç”¨çˆ¶ç±»çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼šå­ç±»é‡å†™init()æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå®ä¾‹åŒ–å­ç±»åï¼Œå°†ä¸ä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨è°ƒç”¨çˆ¶ç±»çš„init()çš„æ–¹æ³•ã€‚ æƒ…å†µä¸‰ï¼šå­ç±»é‡å†™init()æ–¹æ³•åˆéœ€è¦è°ƒç”¨çˆ¶ç±»çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼šä½¿ç”¨superå…³é”®è¯ï¼š ä¾‹å­: ```python class Father(object): def __init__(self, name): self.name=name print ( "name: %s" %( self.name) ) def getName(self): return 'Father ' + self.name class Son(Father): def __init__(self, name): print ( "hi" ) self.name = name def getName(self): return 'Son '+self.name if __name__=='__main__': son=Son('runoob') print ( son.getName() ) """ hi Son runoob """ class Father(object): def __init__(self, name): self.name=name print ( "name: %s" %( self.name)) def getName(self): return 'Father ' + self.name class Son(Father): def __init__(self, name): super(Son, self).__init__(name) print ("hi") self.name = name def getName(self): return 'Son '+self.name if __name__=='__main__': son=Son('runoob') print ( son.getName() ) """ name: runoob hi Son runoob """ åœ¨ç±»çš„ç»§æ‰¿é‡Œé¢super()éå¸¸å¸¸ç”¨ï¼Œ å®ƒè§£å†³äº†å­ç±»è°ƒç”¨çˆ¶ç±»æ–¹æ³•çš„ä¸€äº›é—®é¢˜ï¼Œ çˆ¶ç±»å¤šæ¬¡è¢«è°ƒç”¨æ—¶åªæ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡ï¼Œ ä¼˜åŒ–äº†æ‰§è¡Œé€»è¾‘ï¼Œä¸‹é¢æˆ‘ä»¬å°±æ¥è¯¦ç»†çœ‹ä¸€ä¸‹ã€‚ ä¸¾ä¸€ä¸ªä¾‹å­ï¼š class Foo: def bar(self, message): print(message) >>> Foo().bar("Hello, Python.") Hello, Python. å½“å­˜åœ¨ç»§æ‰¿å…³ç³»çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œæœ‰æ—¶å€™éœ€è¦åœ¨å­ç±»ä¸­è°ƒç”¨çˆ¶ç±»çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶æœ€ç®€å•çš„æ–¹æ³•æ˜¯æŠŠå¯¹è±¡è°ƒç”¨è½¬æ¢æˆç±»è°ƒç”¨ï¼Œéœ€è¦æ³¨æ„çš„æ˜¯è¿™æ—¶selfå‚æ•°éœ€è¦æ˜¾å¼ä¼ é€’ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ï¼š class FooParent: def bar(self, message): print(message) class FooChild(FooParent): def bar(self, message): FooParent.bar(self, message) >>> FooChild().bar("Hello, Python.") Hello, Python. è¿™æ ·åšæœ‰ä¸€äº›ç¼ºç‚¹ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚è¯´å¦‚æœä¿®æ”¹äº†çˆ¶ç±»åç§°ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆåœ¨å­ç±»ä¸­ä¼šæ¶‰åŠå¤šå¤„ä¿®æ”¹ï¼Œå¦å¤–ï¼ŒPythonæ˜¯å…è®¸å¤šç»§æ‰¿çš„è¯­è¨€ï¼Œå¦‚ä¸Šæ‰€ç¤ºçš„æ–¹æ³•åœ¨å¤šç»§æ‰¿æ—¶å°±éœ€è¦é‡å¤å†™å¤šæ¬¡ï¼Œæ˜¾å¾—ç´¯èµ˜ã€‚ä¸ºäº†è§£å†³è¿™äº›é—®é¢˜ï¼ŒPythonå¼•å…¥äº†super()æœºåˆ¶ï¼Œä¾‹å­ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š class FooParent: def bar(self, message): print(message) class FooChild(FooParent): def bar(self, message): super(FooChild, self).bar(message) >>> FooChild().bar("Hello, Python.") xlabel('é¢‘ç‡fï¼ˆhzï¼‰'); ylabel('æŒ¯å¹…è°±'); %æ³¨ï¼šæ—¶é—´åŸŸé‡‡æ ·é—´éš”ä¸º0.001sï¼Œé‡‡æ ·ç‚¹æ•°ä¸º100ç‚¹ï¼Œæ€»çš„æ—¶é—´é•¿åº¦ä¸º0.1sï¼Œåˆ™é¢‘ç‡åŸŸé‡‡æ ·é—´éš”ä¸º10hzã€‚ %% noise = 0.2*cos(2*pi*200*t + pi*45/180); %é¢‘ç‡ç»™å®š180 figure for i = 1:length(t) f_noise(i) = (i-1)*1/dt/number; end subplot(2,1,1) Y_noise = abs(fft(noise)); plot(f_noise(1:length(t)/2),Y_noise(1:length(t)/2)) subplot(212) plot(t,noise) %% b = a + noise ; Y_b = abs(fft(b)); for i = 1:length(t) f_b (i ) = (i-1) * (1/dt)/number; end figure subplot(211) plot(t,b) subplot(212) plot(f_b(1:length(t)/2),Y_b(1:length(t)/2)) %% fc = 10; % t=1/number:2/number:2; h = sin(2*pi*fc.*t)./(pi.*t) ; Y_cc = conv(b,h) ; Y_c = Y_cc(250:749); Y_d = abs(fft(Y_c)) ; for i = 1:length(Y_d) f_c(i) = (i-1)*(1/dt)/number; end figure subplot(223) plot( Y_cc) title('conv') subplot(221) plot(t,b) title('b') subplot(224) plot(f_c(1:length(t)/2),Y_d(1:length(t)/2)) title('frequence filter') subplot(222) plot(f_b(1:length(t)/2),Y_b(1:length(t)/2)) title('frequence noise') ä»£ç 2ï¼š clc,clear % low_pass N = 256 ; %é‡‡æ ·ç‚¹æ•° Fs = 1024; %æ—¶åŸŸé‡‡æ ·é¢‘ç‡1024Hz dt = 1/Fs; %é‡‡æ ·é—´éš” t = dt:dt:dt*N; fm = 30 ; a=(1-2*(pi*fm*t).^2).*exp(-(pi*fm*t).^2); for i = 1:N f_rick(i) = (i-1)*Fs/N ; end Y1 = abs(fft(a))/N*2 ; for fn = [80,150] %å™ªå£°é¢‘ç‡ Hz t2 = -dt*N/2 +dt:dt:dt*N/2 ; % noise = 0.03 + 0.02*sin(2*pi*fn*t2); noise = 0.4*sin(2*pi*fn*t2); Y2 = abs(fft(noise))/N*2 ; a_n = a + noise; Y3 = abs(fft(a_n))/N*2; for fc = [50,100] %ä½é€šæ»¤æ³¢å™¨é˜ˆå€¼ low_pass = sin(2*pi*fc*(t2))./(pi*(t2)) ; for i = 1:N if (t2(i) == 0) low_pass(i) = 2*fc; break; end end Y4 = abs(fft(low_pass))/N*2; deal = conv(a_n,low_pass) ; Y5 = abs(fft(deal))/length(deal)*2; for i = 1:length(deal) f_deal(i) = (i-1)*Fs/length(deal); end %% figure subplot(521) plot(t,a) title('ricker æ—¶é—´åŸŸ') subplot(522) plot(f_rick(1:N/2),Y1(1:N/2)) title('ricker é¢‘ç‡åŸŸ') subplot(523) plot(t2,noise) title(['noise', num2str(fn),' Hz æ—¶é—´åŸŸ']) subplot(524) plot(f_rick(1:N/2),Y2(1:N/2)) title(['noise', num2str(fn),' Hz é¢‘ç‡åŸŸ']) subplot(525) plot(t,a_n) title('combine æ—¶é—´åŸŸ') subplot(526) plot(f_rick(1:N/2),Y3(1:N/2)) title('combine é¢‘ç‡åŸŸ') subplot(527) plot(t2,low_pass) title('ä½é€šæ»¤æ³¢å™¨ æ—¶é—´åŸŸ') subplot(528) plot(f_rick(1:N/2),Y4(1:N/2)) title('ä½é€šæ»¤æ³¢å™¨ é¢‘ç‡åŸŸ') subplot(529) plot(deal) title(['ä½é€šæ»¤æ³¢', num2str(fc),' Hz æ—¶é—´åŸŸ']) subplot(5,2,10) plot(f_deal(1:N),Y5(1:N)) title(['ä½é€šæ»¤æ³¢', num2str(fc),' Hz é¢‘ç‡åŸŸ']) end end ç»“æœå›¾ï¼š é—®é¢˜ï¼š 1.å·ç§¯åï¼Œæ—¶é—´åŸŸä¿¡å·å¦‚ä½•å˜åŒ– Answerï¼š 2.å‰æ™®æ–¯ç°è±¡ Answerï¼š 3.ä¼ªé—¨æ•ˆåº” Answer ï¼š æš‚æœªå‡ºç°

posts.text: åœ°éœ‡æ³¢æ­£æ¼”ç¨‹åºï¼Œé‡‡ç”¨marmousiæ¨¡å‹è¿›è¡Œåœ°éœ‡æ³¢æ¨¡æ‹Ÿï¼Œè¾¹ç•Œè¿›è¡Œäº†PCLå¸æ”¶å¤„ç†ã€‚ ä¸»å‡½æ•°ï¼š %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% %äºŒé˜¶ç©ºé—´äºŒé˜¶æ—¶é—´å£°æ³¢æ–¹ç¨‹ %marmousiæ¨¡å‹ %å ç”¨å†…å­˜ç©ºé—´ä¼˜åŒ– %å°ä»™å‡ºå“ï¼Œå¿…å±ç²¾å“ %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% clc,clear %% è®¾ç½®åˆå§‹å˜é‡ for q=1 load md.txt dh=10;dk=10;dt=0.001;endt=1.7;N=100; %dh,dk,dtåˆ†åˆ«ä¸ºx,z,tçš„å¢é‡ï¼Œendtä¸ºç»ˆæ­¢æ—¶é—´ fm=15;X=384+N*2;Z=122+N*2; %é›·å…‹å­æ³¢ä¸»é¢‘15Hz,å¸æ”¶å±‚åšåº¦ä¸ºN Sx=X/2;Sz=N+3; %éœ‡æºä½ç½® u=zeros(Z,X,3); %åˆå§‹åŒ–ä½ç§»ä¸º0 DT=Dt(Sz,Sx,Z,X); %åˆå§‹åŒ–Î´å‡½æ•° [weakx ,weakz]=attnuate(Z,X,N); v1=min(min(md));v2=max(max(md)); %é€Ÿåº¦æ¨¡å‹ % v=[v1*ones(Z/2,X);v1*ones(Z/4,3*X/8) md v1*ones(Z/4,3*X/8);v1*ones(Z/4,X)]; for ll=1:N vll(:,ll)=md(:,1); vrr(:,ll)=md(:,384); vbb(ll,:)=md(122,:); end vbll=v1*ones(N,N);vbrr=v1*ones(N,N); v=[v1*ones(N,X);vll md vrr;vbll vbb vbrr ]; end %% é¢„åˆ¤æ–­ for q=0 if ( v2*dt/dh >= 1/sqrt(2) ) errordlg( 'ERROR!!! ä¸æ»¡è¶³ç¨³å®šæ€§æ¡ä»¶ï¼å½“å‰ Vmax*dt/dh >= 1/sqrt(2)'); return end if ( dh > v1/8/fm ) warndlg('è¯·å‡å° x çš„æ­¥é•¿ä»¥å‡å°‘é¢‘æ•£' ); return; end end %% è®¡ç®—å·®åˆ†æ–¹ç¨‹ [a,b]=meshgrid(dh:dh:dh*(X-2*N),dk:dk:dk*(Z-2*N)); % figure(1) % imagesc(0:dh:dh*(X-2*N),0:dk:dk*(Z-2*N),u(N+1:Z-N,N+1:X-N,1),[-1,1]) % hold on % contour(a,b,md,'k') % hold on for q=1 k=1; pic_num=1; for number=2:endt/dt for i=2:Z-1 for j=2:X-1 u(i,j,mod(k+2,3)+1)=(dt^2*v(i,j)^2/dh^2*(u(i+1,j,mod(k+1,3)+1)+u(i-1,j,mod(k+1,3)+1)-2*u(i,j,mod(k+1,3)+1))+(2-weakx(i,j)^2*dt^2)*u(i,j,mod(k+1,3)+1)/2+(weakx(i,j)*dt-1)*u(i,j,mod(k,3)+1)/2)/(weakx(i,j)*dt+1)... +(dt^2*v(i,j)^2/dk^2*(u(i,j+1,mod(k+1,3)+1)+u(i,j-1,mod(k+1,3)+1)-2*u(i,j,mod(k+1,3)+1))+(2-weakz(i,j)^2*dt^2)*u(i,j,mod(k+1,3)+1)/2+(weakz(i,j)*dt-1)*u(i,j,mod(k,3)+1)/2)/(weakz(i,j)*dt+1)... +DT(i,j)*ricker(number*dt-dt,fm); end end k=mod(k,3)+1; record(number-1,:)=u(Sz,N+1:X-N,k); if( mod( number, 10) == 0 ) figure(2) imagesc(0:dh:dh*(X-2*N),0:dk:dk*(Z-2*N),u(N+1:Z-N,N+1:X-N,k),[-1,1]); hold on contour(a,b,md,'k') title('Marmousi model snapshot') % h2=colorbar; % set(get(h2,'Title'),'string','u '); colormap(jet) pause(0.0001) F=getframe(gcf); I=frame2im(F); [I,map]=rgb2ind(I,256); if pic_num == 1 imwrite(I,map,'Marmousi_model_snapshot_100.gif','gif', 'Loopcount',inf,'DelayTime',0.001); else imwrite(I,map,'Marmousi_model_snapshot_100.gif','gif','WriteMode','append','DelayTime',0.001); end pic_num = pic_num + 1; end end end %% ç»˜å›¾ %% ***********************é€Ÿåº¦model************************** figure(1) for q=1 % figure(1) imagesc(0:dh:dh*(X-2*N),0:dk:dk*(Z-2*N),v(N+1:Z-N,N+1:X-N)) h=colorbar; set(get(h,'Title'),'string','v (m/s)'); colormap(jet) end %% ***********************åœ°éœ‡è®°å½•*************************** figure(3) imagesc(0:dh:dh*(X-2*N),0:round(endt/dt),record) colormap(gray) colorbar xlabel('X-m') ylabel('t-ms') %% *************************æ»¤æ³¢***************************** figure(4) subplot(1,2,1) %é€Ÿåº¦æ¨¡å‹ imagesc(0:dh:dh*(X-2*N),0:dk:dk*(Z-2*N),v(N+1:Z-N,N+1:X-N)) hold on plot(dh*(X-2*N)/2,20,'pr','MarkerSize',13) text(dh*(X-2*N)/2+35,80,'éœ‡æº','FontSize',15) h=colorbar; set(get(h,'Title'),'string','v (m/s)'); colormap(jet) title('model') xlabel('X-m') ylabel('Z-m') subplot(1,2,2) imagesc(0:dh:dh*(X-2*N),0:round(endt/dt),record) colorbar % colormap(gray) xlabel('X-m') ylabel('t-ms') title('record') è¡°å‡å‡½æ•°ï¼š function [x,z]=attnuate(Z,X,N) %a è¡°å‡å› å­ % Zï¼ŒX è¡Œåˆ—æ•° % N è¡°å‡å±‚æ•° % ä½™å¼¦å‹å¸æ”¶å› å­ B=500; x=zeros(Z,X); z=zeros(Z,X); for i=1:Z for j=1:X if( i < N+1 ) pm=i; z(i,j)=B*(1-cos(pi*(N-pm)/2/N)); if (j<N+1) pmx=j; x(i,j)=B*(1-cos(pi*(N-pmx)/2/N)); else if ( j <= X-N) x(i,j)=0; else pmx=X-j; x(i,j)=B*(1-cos(pi*(N-pmx)/2/N)); end end else if( i <= Z-N ) z(i,j)=0; if ( j < N+1 ) pmx=j; x(i,j)=B*(1-cos(pi*(N-pmx)/2/N)); else if( j <= X-N) x(i,j)=0; else pmx=X-j; x(i,j)=B*(1-cos(pi*(N-pmx)/2/N)); end end else pmz=Z-i; z(i,j)=B*(1-cos(pi*(N-pmz)/2/N)); if ( j < N+1 ) pmx=j; x(i,j)=B*(1-cos(pi*(N-pmx)/2/N)); else if( j <= X-N) x(i,j)=0; else pmx=X-j; x(i,j)=B*(1-cos(pi*(N-pmx)/2/N)); end end end end end end éœ‡æºä½ç½®å‡½æ•°åŠåœ°éœ‡å­æ³¢ï¼š function a=Dt(x,z,xx,zz) %x zï¼Œéœ‡æºä½ç½® %xx zz ç½‘æ ¼å¤§å° a=zeros(xx,zz); a(x,z)=1; end function a = ricker(t,fm) % t: æ—¶é—´ % fm: ä¸»é¢‘ % a: å¹…å€¼ a=(1-2*(pi*fm*t).^2).*exp(-(pi*fm*t).^2); end
